verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father God, we worship You,
Make us part of all You do.
As You move among us now
We worship You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus King, we worship You,
Help us listen now to You.
As You move among us now
We worship You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit pure, we worship You,
With Your fire our zeal renew.
As You move among us now
We worship You.
